1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Abortable process
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Base.Abort.Abortable
6  ( abortable,
7    abortableSourced,
8  ) where
9
10import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture            as O
11import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.IO             as B
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Abort.Reason   as B
13
14
15-- | Push source information when process is aborted.
16abortable :: (B.CodePtr p) => String -> [p] -> O.Map (B.Ab b)
17abortable tag ps = abortablePoints tag $ concatMap B.codePtList ps
18
19abortablePoints :: String -> [B.CodePt] -> O.Map (B.Ab b)
20abortablePoints tag ps = either (Left . push tag ps) Right
21
22push :: String -> [B.CodePt] -> O.Map B.AbortReason
23push tag ps abort@B.AbortReason { B.abortPoint = src } =
24     case ps of
25       []      -> abort
26       [p]     -> abort { B.abortPoint = (tag, p) : src }
27       (p : _) -> push tag [p] abort
28
29abortableSourced :: String -> (a -> B.Ab b) -> B.Sourced a -> B.Ab (B.Sourced b)
30abortableSourced tag f (B.Sourced pt x) =
31    abortable tag pt $ do
32      y <- f x
33      Right $ B.Sourced pt y
34
